path.style: stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill: none;
stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(88, 163, 194); fill: none;
stroke-width: 11; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke: rgb(34, 34, 34); fill: rgb(34, 34, 34);
